projects.name: Aldevron Machine Maintenance
projects.description: Built a full ETL pipeline and XGBoost forecasting models to analyze machine-generated JSON data from Azure Databricks. Created Power BI dashboards to visualize trends and pipeline metrics.

projects.name: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: My personal portfolio website built with React and Tailwind CSS to showcase my projects and skills. I also wanted to become more familiar with React.js and more web development in general

projects.name: Car Data Engineering Pipeline
projects.description: Developed an end-to-end ETL data engineering pipeline to analyze data on cars and their prices. Ingested data from Gaggle and EPA APIs, transformed it using PySpark in Azure Databricks, and visualized insights with Power BI dashboards.

projects.name: Stats Overflow
projects.description: Built a Django sports analytics web app using to deliver real-time stats for professional sports and Valorant esports, including backend logic to ingest scraped data into a SQLite database for updates.

projects.name: Java Chat Server
projects.description: Locally hosted multi-client TCP-based chat server using Java Sockets for communication between clients and server.
